title: Add combinatoric generators to standard library
body:
This issue covers the desire to add combinatoric generators to standard library.

* product()
* permutations()
* combinations()
* combinations_with_replacement()

The work could start (or be based on) as a port of the python equivalences documented at https://docs.python.org/3/library/itertools.html. I have already begun the porting process with success, though would ask for guidance on structure and placement.

A recent code challenge at http://adventofcode.com found the only thing missing from the golang standard library was the generation of combinations and permutations.
